empty.title: Synchronize your contacts
empty.description: Click the "Create a Contact" button to start using the app.
empty.after: Importing your contacts might take a few minutes, time to enjoy a well deserved coffee break ☕️

importation.export_steps_intro: To get your contacts from another program, you must first export the whole list:

importation.partial_success: %{smart_count} of %{total} contact was imported. |||| %{smart_count} of %{total} contacts were imported.

importation.retry_or_select_another_hint: Try again or choose another file.
importation.title: Import contacts

groups.none: There are no existing groups yet.

delete-confirmation.title: Delete this contact?
delete-confirmation.description: This contact will also be deleted from your Google address book

intent.creation_error: An error occured while trying to contact the other app. Please try again later?

manifest.name: Contacts
manifest.short_description: Cozy Contacts helps you to save and secure your contacts on your Cozy.
manifest.long_description:
With Cozy Contacts you can:
- Add, modify and sort your contacts.
- Imports all your contacts from Google, Facebook and more.
